products.title: Personalized 3D Miniature – Full Body Figurine
products.description: Crafted with precision and care, this full-body 3D miniature captures your likeness from head to toe. Made from durable, eco-friendly plastic, it's printed using advanced 3D technology for exceptional detail. Mounted on a sleek black base, this custom figurine is available in multiple sizes to perfectly suit your space.
products.details: Hand-painted with attention to detail, each piece is unique and made to order.

products.title: Personalized 3D Miniature – Half Bust Figurine
products.description: Highlight your personality with this 3D half-bust miniature. Created using high-resolution 3D printing and sustainable plastic, it offers fine craftsmanship and a refined finish. The round base adds a touch of elegance, making it ideal for desks, shelves, or as a thoughtful gift.
products.details: Customizable with various finish options to match your style.

products.title: Personalized 3D Half Bust with Portrait – Legacy Edition
products.description: Celebrate a legacy with this exclusive half-bust miniature paired with a matching portrait. Made from eco-conscious materials and printed with cutting-edge 3D technology, each piece is detailed to perfection. A meaningful way to honor memories with timeless elegance.
products.details: Includes a matching framed portrait and certificate of authenticity.

products.title: Personalized 3D Miniature – Half Bust Figurine (Deluxe)
products.description: Our deluxe half-bust figurine features enhanced details and premium finishing. Each piece is hand-painted by our master artisans, ensuring a museum-quality collectible that captures every nuance of your likeness.
products.details: Includes premium packaging and a display case.

products.title: Decorative Artistic Miniature
products.description: An exquisite decorative piece that showcases intricate artistic details. This premium miniature combines traditional craftsmanship with contemporary design elements.

products.title: Modern Art Inspired Miniature
products.description: Inspired by modern art movements, this unique miniature brings gallery-quality aesthetics to your collection. Features bold design elements and striking visual appeal.

products.title: Abstract Art Miniature Sculpture
products.description: A stunning abstract sculpture that challenges perception and sparks imagination. This thought-provoking piece is perfect for art enthusiasts and creative spaces.

products.title: Miniature Coffee Mug
products.description: An adorable miniature coffee mug with incredible attention to detail. Perfect for dollhouse enthusiasts, collectors, or as a charming desk accessory.

products.title: Historical Soldier Miniature
products.description: Meticulously detailed historical soldier figurine featuring authentic period uniforms and equipment. Ideal for history buffs, wargaming, and educational purposes.

products.title: Miniature Cat Sculpture
products.description: A delightful miniature cat sculpture capturing the playful essence and grace of our feline friends. Hand-crafted with love for cat lovers and collectors.

products.title: Fantasy Warrior Miniature
products.description: An epic fantasy warrior miniature featuring intricate armor details and dynamic pose. Perfect for tabletop gaming, fantasy collections, and RPG enthusiasts.

products.title: Nature-Inspired 3D Printed Tree Model
products.description: A beautifully detailed 3D printed tree model that brings nature indoors. Eco-friendly design with realistic bark texture and branching patterns.

products.title: Personalized 3D Printed Wedding Cake Topper
products.description: Custom 3D printed wedding cake topper made to your specifications. Capture your special moment with this unique, personalized keepsake for your big day.
